greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = binomial(2*(n - 1), n - 1) + 1.
formula: Let G(x) = -1/(x - 1) - I*x/sqrt(4*x - 1) with Im(x) < 0, then a(n) = [x^n] G(x).
The generating function G(x) satisfies the differential equation 6*x^2 - 4*x + 1 = (4*x^4 - 9*x^3 + 6*x^2 - x)*diff(G(x), x) - (2*x^3 - 5*x^2 + 4*x - 1)*G(x).
maple: aList := proc(len) local gf, ser; assume(Im(x)<0);
gf := -1/(x-1) - I*x/sqrt(4*x-1); ser := series(gf, x, len+2):
seq(coeff(ser, x, n), n=0..len) end: aList(27);
xref: Compare to A244174 which is "missing" the second term 2.
results.author: _Peter Luschny_, Feb 12 2019
